channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shelter’s ‘Pet Guardianship’ Program Provides For Pets If Owners Die
item.description: Friends of Strays Animal Shelter in Florida offers peace of mind to people who worry about what would happen if their pet outlives them.

item.title: Adobe Adds Luma, Runway, Marey AI Video To Firefly, AI XR Glasses Sales Surge
item.description: Adobe brings Luma, Runway, and Moonvalley video models to Firefly Boards, AR smart glasses shipments soar, Apple bets on XR series for Vision Pro

item.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon Takes Aim At PC Rivals Intel, AMD, And Apple
item.description: The newest Snapdragon processors for high end smart phones and speedy AI PCs will ship by the end of 2025.

item.title: AI Models Acted Like Voters In 2024 And The Findings Are Startling

item.title: Chasing the snipe

item.title: Value creation
